pages.text: This mod adds new pumpkin themed food, tools, and mobs to your world!$(br)$(br)Pumpkin mobs will wander biomes where pumpkins can be found, such as swamps and plains.

pages.name: Pumpkin Zombie
pages.text: Faster than a normal zombie, these foes inflict the wither effect!$(br)

pages.name: Pumpkin Skeleton
pages.text: A bulkier skeleton that shoots wither tipped arrows!$(br)

pages.name: Pumpkin Creeper
pages.text: A sneaky creeper that hides among pumpkin patches.$(br)
